intro: I wake up at home, exactly at 8:15

I eat a bowl of oatmeal for breakfast.
The oatmeal is like my life:
beige, bland, and boring.
And then I take the bus to work
bus:
It's sprinkling lightly.
I hope the bus seats won't be damp.
boss:
My boss says good morning,
then assigns me work for the day

Recently I've been manually
entering data into spreadsheets

I glace out the window,
 toward the small park off to the right.
Despite working here for 4 years,
 I've never once gone to that park.

I sigh and get back to my work.
The day drags by...
Time to go home (to the left)
water:
After a long day
I'm ready to sleep.

Rain continues falling outside
gently lulling me to sleep

I slowly fall into slumber,
 and begin to dream.
waterAlarm:
My alarm clock begins to ring
waking me from my strange dream.
